Name: Adventures Of Pipi 2 Save Hype
About the game: One year has passed since the events of the first part, Pipi got out of Vapeland and got to his native planet Hypes. Pipi lived peacefully, did not disturb anyone, but one day on his planet flew evil aliens who began to outrage - they stole all the bitcoins and spinners. Old Pipi did not like this and he decided to punish the invaders - take a gun and go ahead, drive out the aliens! You play for Pipi, and you need to destroy enemy aliens and collect bitcoins with spinners. Features: -Continuation of 1 part Adventures Of Pipi -Dialogues, shooting, many levels -Game genre: platformer with shooting -The essence of the game - to collect bitcoins, spinners, read dialogues, destroy aliens (as well as in the first part, when you collect all the items on the level and destroy all aliens - the portal will open and you have to jump there to go to the next level) -Pixel art graphics -Good atmospheric soundtrack -Steam achievements with old Pipi and memes
